version_description: Thanks to your feedback, we have found and fixed a bug with QR codes on the New Chat screen.
Thanks to your feedback, we have found and fixed a bug with QR codes on the New Chat screen.

We got a big news for you!
- Built-in Ethereum wallet! Send and receive ETH right in app
- Send ADM and ETH tokens right in chat

And a huge performance improvements. Syncronization on launch up to 20 times faster!

We got a big news for you!
- Built-in Ethereum wallet! Send and receive ETH right in app
- Send ADM and ETH tokens right in chat

And a huge performance improvements. Syncronization on launch up to 20 times faster!

- Lisk wallet
- Avatars
- Send ADM with comments
- iPad support
- Markdown support
- Better message sending
- Better QR-codes
- More stable, less bugs

1.3.2:
- We added welcome screens.
- Now you can send tokens to uninitialised addresses. Be careful and double check recipient address.

- Local search in messages and contacts
- Smarter transaction status check in chats
- Bugfixes

- Local search in messages and contacts
- Smarter transaction status check in chats
- Bugfixes

- DOGE wallet
- wow

- DOGE wallet
- wow

- Integrated Adamant Info Service - fiat values for your crypto wallets and transfers! Historical values for transfers beginning from March 20.
- Ability to export Private keys for wallets, for usage in external wallet apps.

- Integrated Adamant Info Service - fiat values for your crypto wallets and transfers! Historical values for transfers beginning from March 20.
- Ability to export Private keys for wallets, for usage in external wallet apps.

In this update we've made some improvements for push notifications.
Now you can see the message text and the sender's name; a convenient preview for transfers was also added.
Do not worry, messages are decrypted only on the device right before they are displayed on screen.

You can disable the display of notifications content in the Settings app.

Fixed: 
- Clear data on logout
- ADM transfers with no comments do not show in Chat and Transactions list
- Read name from QR not saved in Address Book
- Crash without connection

Dash support

Receive Free ADM popup
Refresh wallets feature
Fixed bug with scroll when sending a message
“No transactions yet” on wallets history screens if there were no transactions
Show year on wallets history screens for old transactions
Check if partner’s account has a public key
Fixed: misbehavior If account has empty name
Fixed: second vote for delegate fails
Fixed: crash on re-login
